QuestData.Title: Naga Reinforcements
QuestData.Description: They've come slithering up from the ocean depths, $n. The naga. I think their intent is to reinforce the Bastion of Twilight, probably by heading inland via the Verrall river. We can't let that happen!$B$BTeach them that these shores are ours now, and send them scurrying back to the lightless depths.$B$BKill the Blackscale naga worming their way through the Obsidian Breakers!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Blackscale Myrmidons or Blackscale Seacallers.
QuestData.RewardText: That'll send 'em packing, $n! Cho'gall won't be able to count on the naga to back him up in this fight. From here on out, it's just us versus the Twilight's Hammer.$B$B<Simon pauses, his jaw tightening.>$B$B...And the Horde.
